category.name: Product
category.description: My interests are deep-rooted in the field of product management and utilizing data for the betterment of consumers, social service, and entrepreneurship to explore various working aspects of the current dynamic world.

nodes.title: What are Product Managers of 2022 doing?
nodes.subtitle: Tools that actually help you and are simple to learn.

nodes.title: Should Big Decisions Be Based on Data or Your Intuition?
nodes.description: Data is black and white and incredibly useful but it does not paint the entire picture. This is where intuition comes into play.

nodes.title: My 3 strategies for leading through these uncertain times!
nodes.description: Pandemic provides enough reminders that leaders cannot control the degree of change. Let's take control.
